4307700.name: One More Wipe!
4307700.description:
"Everything is under control. I can hold it a bit more. I just need one more lucky spin..." - that’s when everything went very, very wrong.

You sit down to calmly do your business… only to discover there’s no toilet paper anywhere. No backup plan. No second chances. Now the only way to stay in control is by gambling on a slot machine that might give you toilet paper - or might make everything much worse...



In One More Wipe, a pressure meter is constantly rising, and your only option is trusting a slot machine with your fate.

Pull the lever.
Win toilet paper.
Feel hope. Briefly.

But what if you don't wipe right now? What if you use toilet paper for an upgrade, because clearly you can handle one more spin. The longer you push your luck, the faster the pressure builds, and the more the game dares you to keep pretending everything is fine.



Features:
  • Slot-machine-driven gameplay where every spin can save you or end the run
  • A constantly rising pressure meter that never lets you relax
  • Risk vs safety decisions every few seconds
  • Short, intense, highly replayable runs that escalate fast
  • Steam Leaderboards - compare your survival time with other optimists
  • Absurd humor built entirely around bad decisions

DISCLAIMER!

ONE MORE WIPE! is not a gambling game with microtransactions. It is an absurd parody of gambling games with elements of slot machines. The game is not related to real gambling in any way and will never ask you for real money.
4307700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
